string-array.name: dialogue_000
string-array.item: Welcome to the town of Bunille!
Here in Bunille, it is widely populated with\nsentient bunny-shaped plants.
There are many types of these\nplants that exists in this world.
And together, we can create a\nflourishing society.
Currently, Bunille is low on residents.
Meaning that our society can\'t flourish.
Lets get you started in\nhelping our society grow.
